title: The Market Expects That Everything Will Be Awesome
sub_head: Optimism is high, but investing also involves comparing the future with what’s priced in
body:
Rarely have investors had better reason to be optimistic. Vaccines are imminent, the economy’s doing well and money has never been cheaper.
After an awful year, things are finally looking up.
The trouble is that investing involves not just predicting the future—golden!—but comparing it to what is already priced in. If everyone already expects...
